abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Multi-Country
            Capacity-Building for Compliance with the Cartagena Protocol
            on Biosafety Project for Latin America is to strengthen the
            capacity in the four participating countries to implement
            the Cartagena protocol on biosafety. Specifically, it aims
            to strengthen the technical capacity in knowledge generation
            for biosafety risk assessment and management; and strengthen
            the biosafety decision-making capacity. The need for
            extension has been discussed within the project teams
            comprising the regional coordinator, the four national
            coordinators and the thematic leaders. Consequently, project
            activities (through subprojects) that depend on an
            agricultural calendar and crop biological processes, such as
            planting and harvesting seasons, will need to continue
            beyond the current closing date.
